Articles.Content:
Hello,

I want to show you my very first ship, which was build for a contract to bring a class D asteroid in a stable orbit around Minmus.

It has 4 atomic engines, an ISRU to convert the resources of the asteroid to refuel itself.
Fully fuelled it has about 300 m/s delta V on an 420t asteroid.

http://imgur.com/YGB28kl

http://imgur.com/JxCPSNp
